## TextureBuffer interface

Buffer holding a texture.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextureBuffer 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [buffer](./harp-datasource-protocol.texturebuffer.buffer.md) | ArrayBuffer | Buffer containing the (compressed) image or the raw texture data. |
|  [dataTextureProperties](./harp-datasource-protocol.texturebuffer.datatextureproperties.md) | [DataTextureProperties](./harp-datasource-protocol.datatextureproperties.md) | Properties for creating a three.js DataTexture (https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/textures/DataTexture). |
|  [type](./harp-datasource-protocol.texturebuffer.type.md) | string | Mime type of the image or 'image/raw' in case of raw texture data. |
